trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewRowCollection contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Contiene il DataGridViewRowCollection il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>gli oggetti in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an instance of this class through the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile recuperare un'istanza di questa classe tramite il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection maintains a reference to the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta mantiene un riferimento al controllo tramite la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A>

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, a DataGridViewRowCollection includes shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: Per migliorare le prestazioni, un DataGridViewRowCollection include righe condivise e non condivise.

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: La memoria per ridurre il costo di un set di record di grandi dimensioni viene condivisa.

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible.
trans-unit.target: Se il set di record è molto grande, deve prestare attenzione a mantenere le righe condivise il più possibile.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new row to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge una nuova riga alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Add overload adds rows that are based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: L'overload del componente aggiunge righe che si basano <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new row is shared, if possible.
trans-unit.target: La nuova riga è condivisa, se possibile.

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property can be shared for best scalability.
trans-unit.target: Assicurarsi che la riga specificata nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>proprietà può essere condivisa per garantire la massima scalabilità.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Le righe nel controllo non vengono ordinate automaticamente quando vengono aggiunte nuove righe.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=fullName> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Per ordinare le nuove righe nella relativa posizione corretta, chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=fullName>gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>gestore eventi per ordinare le righe quando l'utente modifica una cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Le righe nel controllo non vengono ordinate automaticamente quando vengono aggiunte nuove righe.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=fullName> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Per ordinare le nuove righe nella relativa posizione corretta, chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=fullName>gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>gestore eventi per ordinare le righe quando l'utente modifica una cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Due to a bug, the AddRange method will make your application stop responding if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property is `true` and the row for new records is selected.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > A causa di un bug, il metodo AddRange renderà arresta dell'applicazione risponde quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>proprietà `true` e verrà selezionata la riga per nuovi record.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of the row before calling this method, and then reselect the row.
trans-unit.target: Per risolvere questo problema, è necessario annullare la selezione della riga prima di chiamare questo metodo e quindi selezionare di nuovo la riga.

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Le righe nel controllo non vengono ordinate automaticamente quando vengono aggiunte nuove righe.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=fullName> event handler.

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Le righe nel controllo non vengono ordinate automaticamente quando vengono aggiunte nuove righe.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=fullName> event handler.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Due to a bug, the InsertRange method will make your application stop responding if any rows with an index greater than `rowIndex` are selected.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > A causa di un bug, il metodo InsertRange renderà arresta dell'applicazione risponde quando tutte le righe con un indice maggiore `rowIndex` sono selezionati.

trans-unit.source: To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of these rows before calling this method, and reselect the rows afterward.
trans-unit.target: Per risolvere questo problema, è necessario annullare la selezione di queste righe prima di chiamare questo metodo e selezionarle.
